lead_paragraph: Giancarlo Stanton homered, doubled and drove in two runs to lead the Marlins past the Dodgers 3-2 on Monday night in Miami manager Don Mattingly's return to Los Angeles.

headline.print_headline: Stanton Leads Marlins Past Dodgers in Mattingly's Return
headline.main: Stanton Leads Marlins Past Dodgers in Mattingly's Return
